actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution to declare that a state of war exists between the organization referring to itself as the Islamic State and the Government and the people of the United States, and to make provisions to prosecute the same.
short_title: Declaration of War against the Organization known as the Islamic State

titles.title: Declaration of War against the Organization known as the Islamic State

A joint resolution to declare that a state of war exists between the organization referring to itself as the Islamic State and the Government and the people of the United States, and to make provisions to prosecute the same.
